response.original_title: Joseph Brodsky: In the Prison of Latitudes
response.overview: Iosif Brodskiy was born in Leningrad in 1940 and died in New York in 1996 as Joseph Brodsky. Between the two spellings of his name lies one of the more dramatic human and poetic destinies in 20th century Russia.
response.tagline: The dramatic destiny and passionate spirit of Russian poet Joseph Brodsky
response.title: Joseph Brodsky: In the Prison of Latitudes
